ygData.subject: Re: Side effect/Symptom of twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A level 2 paladin at the bank was begging from my group last night.  I looked at his equipment.  I told him to sell his fine steel 2H sword and use the
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 15 Jul 1999 RON_TALBOT@... wrote:
>
> YES!, It is very annoying. I like to help out people within the
> confines of the game (locate body ect.) but Begging for money is a
> different case altogether. I always ignore begging but it makes me
> feel guilty anyway.

A level 2 paladin at the bank was begging from my group last
night. I looked at his equipment. I told him to sell his
fine steel 2H sword and use the money to fill in his empty
armor slots.

If you don't beg, I just might give you stuff if you look like
you're in a jam (spent two hours helping people recover their
bodies in Befallen a couple nights ago). If you beg, I won't
give you stuff because that will just encourage more begging.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
